fullplot: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.
plot: A film about Mark David Chapman in the days leading up to the infamous murder of Beatle John Lennon.
title: Chapter 27

tomatoes.consensus: Despite Jared Leto's committed performance, Chapter 27 fails to penetrate to mind of Mark David Chapman, John Lennon's killer.

writers: Jack Jones (inspired by the book "Let Me Take You Down")
